name: Grid Overload (Solrun)
description:
Controls: Mouse. Left click to place. Right click to rotate

It's like tetris and a match 3 game. Get a line of 6 tiles in a row or 3 shapes of the same colour touching and they will pop.

Try to build your way to the white X's on the grid. You need to reach all 6 X's with one continuous blob of blocks.

Made for Mini Jam 100:Overload. Theme was Overload. Restriction was Chaos is Everything. Overload was the grid expanding when you went over the edge. For chaos, I figured neatly making line and matches is the opposite of chaos so what if I make you want to not get lines and matches? Truth be told, the more chaotic features are still on the drawing board.

Code: https://github.com/TyLanger/GridOverload
